text: Parkgate United F.C. was an English association football club based in Parkgate, Rotherham, South Yorkshire. ==History== The club was formed in the early 1880s as Rawmarsh & Parkgate. They finished as runners-up in the 1895 Hatchard League and shared the Sheffield Association League title in 1899 with Worksop Town. They first entered the FA Cup in 1896. ==Honours== ===League=== *Sheffield Association League **Champions: 1897–98, 1898–99 (shared) *Hatchard League **Runners-up: 1894–95 ===Cup=== ==Records== *Best FA Cup performance: 3rd Qualifying Round, 1897–98 ==References== Category:Defunct football clubs in England Category:Defunct football clubs in South Yorkshire Category:Hatchard League Category:Sheffield Association League Category:Association football clubs established in the 19th century
title: Parkgate United F.C.
